Documentation Home

Quick StartÂ¶

Install the NuGet package

Install-Package KnightMoves.SqlObjects

Import the namespace

using KnightMoves.SqlObjects;

Use the Fluent API through the static TSQL class

var sql = TSQL

     .SELECT()
       .STAR()
     .FROM("Products")
     .Build()

;

Console.WriteLine(sql);

Output:

SELECT
 *
FROM [Products]
